name: Feedback Sports Scorpion 2-Piece Storage/Repair Bike Stand
description: Whether you use it for storage or to wash or repair your bike, the Scorpion floor stand keeps your steed standing tall. The simple design uses the hole in your hollow crank to keep your bike upright and hold the rear wheel off the ground. With a capacity of 22kg, it even works for downhill rigs. And it folds flat for easy carrying, so you can bring it to trailheads and races for easier pre-ride adjustments and post-ride cleaning.Compatible with mountain bikes with 26, 27.5 and 29in. wheels.Includes 13mm, 18mm and 20mm crank spacers.2-piece design folds flat for transport.Compatible with hollow cranks with an opening of 13mm or more.Base is 40 x 40cm.Height is 51cm.Max load is 22.6kg (50lb).
